section.title: Overview
section.description: The Send Keys action specifies keystrokes to send to Alpha Anywhere or another application. Immediately before the Send Keys action to set focus? to the window and/or object to which you want to send keystrokes.

step.description: Optionally, check the Record keystrokes check box. Enter the keystrokes that you wish to send into the text window. Preface shifted keys with the plus "+" character. Preface control keys with the caret "^" character. Preface ALT keys with the caret "%" character.
Click Clear to erase the contents of the text window.
Select where you are going to send the keystrokes. The options are:

case.description: "Send keystrokes to an Alpha Anywhere window"

step.description: If you selected "Send keystrokes to another program", select the program from the External program window name field.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.

see.ref: Switch to Another non-Alpha Anywhere Window
